description.value: ValueSet IMMZD2DTMumps for IMMZ.D2.DT.Mumps. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a mumps vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: 2-dose schedule (countries with mumps in schedule and low transmission of measles)
